fields.name: media_id
fields.description: A unique identifier of a multimedia file within a project.

fields.name: deployment_id
fields.description: The unique identifier of the deployment this observation belongs to. Foreign key to `deployment:deployment_id`.

fields.name: event_id
fields.description: A unique identifier of an event within a project. Events contain one or more multimedia files (e.g. a single image or video or a sequence of successive images or videos) and are defined by `event_interval` in the package metadata.

fields.name: timestamp
fields.description: Date and time when the multimedia file was recorded, as an ISO 8601 formatted string in UTC (e.g. `YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ`).

fields.name: file_path
fields.description: Url or relative path to the multimedia file, respectively for externally hosted files or files that are part of this package. Additional information on how to access this file is provided in a package-level metadata.

fields.name: file_name
fields.description: Name of a multimedia file. This field is optional and supports cases where the file name is not a part of url provided in `file_path`.

fields.name: exif_data
fields.description: EXIF data of the file, as a valid JSON object.
